This is the homepage for STatisticians Advancing in R for Data Science (STAR-DS) by [Dr. Mehdi Maadooliat](http://www.mssc.mu.edu/~mehdi), [Dr. Jaihee Choi](https://www.marquette.edu/mathematical-and-statistical-sciences/directory/jaihee-choi.php) and [Dr. Daniel Circovic](https://cirkovd.github.io/). All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/course-syllabus.html) and the course schedule [here](/).
